statements: INSERT INTO FoodAndBeverage (id, name, category, price) VALUES (1, 'Pizza', 'Main', 15.99) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Pizza', category = 'Main', price = 15.99;
INSERT INTO FoodAndBeverage (id, name, category, price) VALUES (2, 'Burger', 'Main', 9.99) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Burger', category = 'Main', price = 9.99;
INSERT INTO FoodAndBeverage (id, name, category, price) VALUES (3, 'Coke', 'Drink', 1.99) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Coke', category = 'Drink', price = 1.99;
UPSERT INTO Food (id, name, type) VALUES (1, 'Pizza', 'Italian')
UPSERT INTO Beverage (id, name, type) VALUES (1, 'Coke', 'Soda')
UPSERT INTO Food (id, name, type) VALUES (2, 'Sushi', 'Japanese')
UPSERT INTO Food (name, category_id) VALUES ('Pizza', 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE category_id = VALUES(category_id);
UPSERT INTO Beverage (name, category_id) VALUES ('Coke', 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE category_id = VALUES(category_id);
UPSERT INTO FoodCategory (id, name) VALUES (1, 'Italian') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = VALUES(name);
UPSERT INTO Food (id, name, category, price, quantity) VALUES (1, 'Pizza', 'Italian', 9.99, 10);
UPSERT INTO Beverage (id, name, brand, price) VALUES (1, 'Cola', 'Coca-Cola', 1.99);
UPSERT INTO Ingredient (id, name, category, price) VALUES (1, 'Flour', 'Baking', 5.99);
